channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow

item.title: CVE-2022-38390|2024-08-03T10:54:03.745Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: Multiple IBM Business Automation Workflow versions are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 233978.

item.title: CVE-2021-29775|2024-08-03T22:18:02.447Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 19.0.03 and 20.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Automation 20.0.3-IF002 and 21.0.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 203029.

item.title: CVE-2021-29878|2024-08-03T22:18:03.192Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0, and 21.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 206581.

item.title: CVE-2021-29835|2024-08-03T22:18:03.150Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0, and 21.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 204833.

item.title: CVE-2022-42435|2024-08-03T13:10:41.010Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0, 18.0.1, 18.0.2, 19.0.1, 19.0.2, 19.0.3, 20.0.1, 20.0.2, 20.0.3, 21.0.1, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, and 22.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 238054.

item.title: CVE-2021-29834|2024-08-03T22:18:03.192Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, 18.0.0.2, 19.0.0.1, 19.0.0.2, 19.0.0.3,20.0.0.1, 20.0.0.2, and 21.0.2 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 are vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 204832.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T18:49:24.893Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T13:34:16.845Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.
